scripts.feed:deploy: graph deploy restaking/dev subgraph.datafeed.yaml --node https://linea-mainnet-graph.zypher.game/jsonrpc --network linea --network-file=networks.mainnet.json --ipfs https://linea-mainnet-graph.zypher.game
